Package com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block

Interface Summary
Replaceable Interface for replaceable items (blocks, paintings).
 

Class Summary
BlockId A utility class to represent a block type along with optional data.
BurntBlockManager Manager to handle the burnt blocks.
CreeperBlock Represents a block that can be replaced.
CreeperBurntBlock This class represents a burnt block.
CreeperExplosion Represents an explosion, with the list of blocks destroyed, the time of the explosion, and the radius.
CreeperHanging Represents a hanging, i.e.
ExplodedBlockManager Manager for the explosions list and the explosion index.
FallIndex Handle the map for the blocks prevented from falling.
NeighborBlock Represents a possibly dependent neighbor block.
NeighborChest Represents the second part of a double chest, the first one being a CreeperChest.
RailsIndex Contains and manages the list of rails whose update should be prevented.
ReplacementTimer Utility for all entities whose replacement is timed.
ToReplaceList Class to handle the blocks to be replaced immediately.
